content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Hello Farhad Abbasi,

Let's start with a high price to see how far you are willing to go. I want 1200 Euro per month. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities. My goal is to rent it out for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. Well, I must say that the price is quite high. I understand that the apartment is in a great location and has good facilities, but the unfurnished nature of the apartment and its lack of furniture makes it less appealing to me. I am willing to pay 800 Euro per month for an unfurnished apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I decline your offer of 800 Euro per month. My goal is to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. I am willing to negotiate, but I am not willing to go that low. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that, Mister Schmidt. I am willing to increase my offer considering that the apartment is new and in a great location. I am willing to pay 950 Euro per month for the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I decline your offer of 950 Euro per month. My goal is to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. I am willing to negotiate, but I am not willing to go that high. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. Well, I am willing to meet you halfway. I can offer 1000 Euro per month for the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I decline your offer of 1000 Euro per month. My goal is to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. I am willing to negotiate, but I am not willing to go that low. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that, Mister Schmidt. I am willing to increase my offer again. I am willing to pay 1050 Euro per month for the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I decline your offer of 1050 Euro per month. My goal is to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. I am willing to negotiate, but I am not willing to go that high. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. Well, I am willing to meet you halfway again. I can offer 1025 Euro per month for the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 1050 Euro per month! Let's proceed with the lease agreement for the apartment. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities. I am looking forward to having you as my tenant.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
